cp /config/cookies.txt /config/cookies-rw.txt
ytdl-sub --log-level=debug --config=/config/config.yaml sub /media/youtube/subscriptions.yaml
echo "[cronjob:command] Fixing permissions, started at $$(date --rfc-2822)"
find $${MEDIA_FOLDER} -user root -exec chown 568:568 "{}" \; -exec chmod 777 "{}" \;
echo "[cronjob:command] Fixed permissions, ended at $$(date --rfc-2822)"

mqtt:
  host: emqx.home.svc.cluster.local
  username: "${DT_MQTT_USERNAME}"
  password: "${DT_MQTT_PASSWORD}"

frigate:
  url: http://frigate.home.svc.cluster.local:5000
  cameras:
    - amcrest-frontyard
    - amcrest-pool
    - amcrest-turret
    - amcrest-office

  zones:
    - camera: amcrest-frontyard
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-pool
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-turret
      zone: familyroom
    - camera: amcrest-office
      zone: office

  events:

detect:
  match:
    save: true
  unknown:
    save: true

detectors:
  deepstack:
    enabled: true
    url: "http://deepstack.home.svc.cluster.local:5000"
  compreface:
    enabled: false

time:
  timezone: America/New_York

notify:

0: Jammin' with the  console  cowboys in  cyberspace
1: Hobbyist developer | Gamer | #ActuallyAutistic | I.T-student at Turku University of Applied Sciences. | AS213021 network operator

0:
[ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "APC Back-UPS RS 900G"
  vendorid = 051d
  productid = 0002
  serial = 3B1227X00136

[monuser]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave
[monmaster]
  password = secret
  upsmon master
